entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.0°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 6.5°C
Wind: SSW 40 km/h gust 64 km/h

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. High 8 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to freezing rain or rain near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northeast 20 near noon. High 8 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to rain this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then light overnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
